participant_1.background:
I have to work hard to keep up with my family.
I have a bad back from years of standing on my feet all day.
I want to learn to sew my own clothes.
My favorite people are the ones who support me and encourage me to be the best version of myself.
I like to take my boat out on the weekends and just relax, not really doing anything productive.

participant_2.background:
I binged on British shows and movies while I was confined to my bed on vacation.
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i am a carefree , funloving , free spirited person.
i enjoy john grisham movies , but not his books.
i enjoy cold winters and strong breezes.

content.text: Hey there! I'm on my way home from a long day at work. How has your day been?
Hey! I've been confined to bed for the last few days due to a nasty cold. I've been binge watching British shows and movies.
Oh no! That sounds awful. I hope you feel better soon. What shows have you been watching?
I've been watching a lot of Downton Abbey, The Crown, and Call the Midwife. They're all so good!
I love Downton Abbey! I've been meaning to check out the other two.
You should! They're both really good. I've been trying to watch something light and fluffy to take my mind off of being sick.
I totally get that. I've been watching a lot of Disney movies on my days off.
That's a great idea! I love Disney movies. What have you been watching?
I've been watching a lot of the classics, like The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and Aladdin.
Those are all great movies! I love them all.
Me too! They're so much fun to watch.
I'm glad you're enjoying them. I hope you feel better soon!
Thanks! I'm feeling a little better already.
